General.Name: ShuYu Civilian Pharmacy Corp. Ltd.
General.Description: ShuYu Civilian Pharmacy Corp., Ltd. operates a chain of pharmaceutical retail stores in China. It offers Chinese and Western patent medicines, health foods, Chinese herbal medicines, health equipment, and other products. The company is also involved in the pharmaceutical online store and wholesale business. ShuYu Civilian Pharmacy Corp., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Jinan, China.
General.Address: No. 56 Shanda North Road, Jinan, China, 250100
